pages.text: When constructing your dam, it is important to use high pressure pipes instead of traditional pipes. Any other pipes will reduce the efficiency of the dam turbine.$(br2)It can transfer 200 buckets (default) per tick.

Can generate rotation $(l)faster$() for dam turbines based on the height (y-level) difference between dam intake and dam turbine (location of input) up to 16 blocks for addition 100% bonus.$(br2)High pressure pipes can only function if it connected to no more than 1 dam intake and no more than 1 dam turbine and must connect to intake or outlet for full potential. (No Trash cans/Sinks/Pump)

Using pipes other than high pressure pipes on the input side will reduce the speed in which the rotation is generated. On output side will reduce the maximum allowed rotation. Both up to 90% reduction.
